content: Shielding X-SR F3 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening ### FEATURES:Features Work more cleanly and effectively - isolates the welding area during fusion, to allow the correct flow of shielding gas Supports weld distancing – helps provide the correct distance between studs and the base material for a correct arc and accurate stud fusion Applications Fastening to steel in polluted/corrosive environments (up to C5) for higher tensile loads or thinner base materials, and preserving the base material integrity Steel fastening in wind, oil and gas offshore/onshore installations – cable tray/ladder supports, non-critical pipe supports, multi-disciplinary supports and other equipment fastenings ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2331667 - Shielding X-SR F3 - Package Size 1 pc
